body_html: Since there was discussion on this earlier, the bfloat16 quantization is (should be) an implementation detail for network transfer only (@josh11b, @vrv do you agree?). I don't understand the comment about Variables: in what way does is_floating not work for variables?

body: Since there was discussion on this earlier, the bfloat16 quantization is (should be) an implementation detail for network transfer only (@josh11b, @vrv do you agree?). I don't understand the comment about Variables: in what way does is_floating not work for variables?
